from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Claim_insurance_explode_df = Claim_df.select("id", explode(Claim_df.insurance))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_insurance_df= Claim_insurance_explode_df.toDF(*( "Claim_id","insurance"))

Claim_insurance_df = Claim_insurance_df.select("Claim_id","insurance.coverage.display","insurance.focal","insurance.sequence").toDF(*("Claim_id","insurance_coverage_display","insurance_focal","insurance_sequence" ))

#    base_df_explode = base_df.select(explode(base_df.entry))
#### Create a data frame with the loaded silver data
### **Create a data frame with the incremental data**
#### Create database for the hive tables
###### Create data frame with the incremental claim procedure data

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_procedure_2021_explode_df = Claim_2021_df.select("id",explode(Claim_2021_df.procedure))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_procedure_new_df= Claim_procedure_2021_explode_df.toDF(*( "id","procedure"))

Claim_procedure_new_df = Claim_procedure_new_df.select("id","procedure.procedureReference.reference","procedure.sequence").toDF(*("Claim_id","procedure_reference","procedure_sequence"))

Claim_procedure_new_df.printSchema()


#Claim_procedure_new_df=Claim_procedure_new_df.withColumn("procedure_reference",regexp_replace("procedure_reference","Procedure/",""))

#Claim_procedure_new_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Claim_procedure/")

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

Claim_procedure_new_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Claim_procedure/delta/delta2021/")

#delta_observation_procedure = DeltaTable.convertToDelta(spark,"parquet.`abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Claim_procedure/delta`")

spark.sql("CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS fhir_data")
spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fhir_data.delta_claim_procedure USING DELTA LOCATION '{0}'".format(delta_claim_location))
#spark.sql("CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS fhir_data.claim_procedure USING LOCATION '{0}'".format(silver_location))

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_claim_procedure target
USING fhir_data.delta_claim_procedure_2021 source
ON
source.Claim_ID = target.Claim_ID
AND source.procedure_reference = target.procedure_reference
AND source.procedure_sequence = target.procedure_sequence
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
target.Claim_ID = source.Claim_ID
,target.procedure_reference = source.procedure_reference
,target.procedure_sequence = source.procedure_sequence
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.Claim_ID 
,target.procedure_reference
,target.procedure_sequence)
VALUES (source.Claim_ID
,source.procedure_reference
,source.procedure_sequence)

Claim_insurance_2021_df = Claim_insurance_2021_df.select("Claim_id","insurance.coverage.display","insurance.focal","insurance.sequence").toDF(*("Claim_id","insurance_coverage_display","insurance_focal","insurance_sequence" ))

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_claim_insurance target
USING fhir_data.delta_claim_insurance_2021 source
ON
source.Claim_ID = target.Claim_ID
AND source.insurance_coverage_display = target.insurance_coverage_display
AND source.insurance_focal = target.insurance_focal
AND source.insurance_sequence = target.insurance_sequence
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
target.Claim_ID = source.Claim_ID
,target.insurance_coverage_display = source.insurance_coverage_display
,target.insurance_focal = source.insurance_focal
,target.insurance_sequence = source.insurance_sequence
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.Claim_ID 
,target.insurance_coverage_display
,target.insurance_focal
,target.insurance_sequence)
VALUES (source.Claim_ID
,source.insurance_coverage_display
,source.insurance_focal
,source.insurance_sequence)

Claim_diagnosis_2021_df = Claim_diagnosis_2021_df.select("Claim_id","diagnosis.diagnosisReference.reference","diagnosis.sequence").toDF(*("Claim_id","diagnosis_reference","diagnosis_sequence" ))

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------

Claim_diagnosis_2021_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Claim_diagnosis/delta/delta2021/")

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_claim_diagnosis target
USING fhir_data.delta_claim_diagnosis_2021 source
ON
source.Claim_ID = target.Claim_ID
AND source.diagnosis_reference = target.diagnosis_reference
AND source.diagnosis_sequence = target.diagnosis_sequence
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET
target.Claim_ID = source.Claim_ID
,target.diagnosis_reference = source.diagnosis_reference
,target.diagnosis_sequence = source.diagnosis_sequence
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.Claim_ID 
,target.diagnosis_reference
,target.diagnosis_sequence)
VALUES (source.Claim_ID
,source.diagnosis_reference
,source.diagnosis_sequence)
###### Now do the same thing for claims main

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_main_explode_df = Claim_2021_df.select("id","resourceType","status","billablePeriod.end","billablePeriod.start","created","patient.display","patient.reference",
    "prescription.reference","provider.display","provider.reference","total.currency","total.value","use")

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_main_2021_df= Claim_main_explode_df.toDF(*("Claim_id","resourceType","status","billablePeriod_end","billablePeriod_start","created",
    "patient_display","patient_id_reference","prescription_reference","provider_display","provider_org_id_reference","total_currency","total_value","use"))

Claim_main_2021_df = Claim_main_2021_df.withColumn("patient_id_reference",regexp_replace("patient_id_reference","Patient/","")).withColumn(
    "provider_org_id_reference",regexp_replace("provider_org_id_reference","Organization/",""))

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

claim_main_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Claim_main/delta/")

Claim_main_2021_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Claim_main/delta/delta2021/")

%%sql
MERGE INTO fhir_data.delta_claim_main target
USING fhir_data.delta_claim_main_2021 source
ON
source.Claim_id = target.Claim_id                
AND source.resourceType = target.resourceType
AND source.status = target.status
AND source.billablePeriod_end = target.billablePeriod_end
AND source.billablePeriod_start = target.billablePeriod_start
AND source.created = target.created
AND source.patient_display = target.patient_display
AND source.patient_id_reference = target.patient_id_reference
AND source.prescription_reference = target.prescription_reference
AND source.provider_display = target.provider_display
AND source.provider_org_id_reference = target.provider_org_id_reference
AND source.total_currency = target.total_currency
AND source.total_value = target.total_value
AND source.use = target.use
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET 
target.Claim_id = source.Claim_id                
,target.resourceType = source.resourceType
,target.status = source.status
,target.billablePeriod_end = source.billablePeriod_end
,target.billablePeriod_start = source.billablePeriod_start
,target.created = source.created
,target.patient_display = source.patient_display
,target.patient_id_reference = source.patient_id_reference
,target.prescription_reference = source.prescription_reference
,target.provider_display = source.provider_display
,target.provider_org_id_reference = source.provider_org_id_reference
,target.total_currency = source.total_currency
,target.total_value = source.total_value
,target.use            = source.use
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (target.Claim_id                  
,target.resourceType              
,target.status                    
,target.billablePeriod_end        
,target.billablePeriod_start      
,target.created                   
,target.patient_display           
,target.patient_id_reference      
,target.prescription_reference    
,target.provider_display          
,target.provider_org_id_reference 
,target.total_currency            
,target.total_value               
,target.use)
values (source.Claim_id                
,source.resourceType
,source.status
,source.billablePeriod_end
,source.billablePeriod_start
,source.created
,source.patient_display
,source.patient_id_reference
,source.prescription_reference
,source.provider_display
,source.provider_org_id_reference
,source.total_currency
,source.total_value
,source.use)

#-------------create the delta with the existing records------------------
from delta.tables import *

observation_procedure_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("delta").save("abfss://silver@amheroldhackathonstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Claim_procedure/delta/")

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode

Observation_main_df = Observation_df.select(
    "Observation_id","resourceType","issued","status", "patient_id_reference","encounter_id_reference","effectiveDateTime",
    "valueQuantity.code","valueQuantity.system","valueQuantity.unit","valueQuantity.value","valueString").toDF(*(
    "Observation_id","resourceType","issued","status","patient_id_reference","encounter_id_reference","effectiveDateTime",
    "valueQuantity_code","valueQuantity_system",
    "valueQuantity_unit","valueQuantity_value","valueString"))

from pyspark.sql.functions import explode
from pyspark.sql.functions import regexp_replace

Claim_procedure_explode_df = Claim_df.select("id",explode(Claim_df.procedure))

#use toDF() to rename the columns
Claim_procedure_df= Claim_procedure_explode_df.toDF(*( "id","procedure"))

Claim_procedure_df = Claim_procedure_df.select("id","procedure.procedureReference.reference","procedure.sequence").toDF(*("Claim_id","procedure_reference","procedure_sequence"))

Claim_procedure_df=Claim_procedure_df.withColumn("procedure_reference",regexp_replace("procedure_reference","Procedure/",""))

Claim_procedure_df.write.mode(write_mode).parquet(silver_location+"Claim_procedure/")
